```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(gt)
table <- tribble(~a, ~b, ~c,
                "text", 1, "Long text aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaargh",
                "others", 2, "Long text aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaargh") 
gt(table)
```
